game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: A powerful artifact has been stolen from the village, and the only clue is a map that leads to an ancient temple deep in the jungle. Retrieve the artifact and return it to the village elder.

tasks.description: Navigate through the jungle to reach the entrance of the temple. Be cautious of wild animals and traps.
Use your wits to solve a ancient puzzle that blocks the path to the artifact. The solution can be found on an ancient scroll in the temple.
Once past the puzzle, retrieve the artifact and prepare for your return journey.
